body.p: Instead, the IASB decided to expand the short-term lease exemption by making the determination of duration of short-term leases consistent with the determination of lease term, thus considering the likelihood of extension options being exercised or termination options not being exercised (see paragraphs BC152–BC159). Accordingly, IFRS 16 defines a short-term lease as a lease that, at the commencement date, has a lease term of 12 months or less.
